title: Handle a Reasonable Accommodation Request
description: A tenant with a disability requests to install grab bars in the bathroom as a reasonable accommodation under the Fair Housing Act.

tasks.description: Receive the tenant's request and verify their disability-related need if it is not apparent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the request and understands its basis.

tasks.description: Review the request to ensure it is reasonable and does not pose an undue financial or administrative burden.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the request is reasonable.

tasks.description: Approve the request and allow the tenant to install the grab bars at their own expense, potentially requiring them to restore the wall upon move-out.
tasks.expected_outcome: The accommodation is approved in compliance with fair housing laws.
